Summary: I was in my car, parking outsite the city of Indianapolis, in the forets, writing poetry,then i saw something above my car roof, like a cloud, but then i saw it was a UFO over me
divs: Sighting Details In a forest park outsite of Indianapolis city. This event ocurred on september 1997. About 4:30-5:00 pm. I was siting in my car, writing poetry. Then a saw over me something like a cloud, but when i took a very good look at it, i notice i was a UFO over me. For about 2 minutes the UFO just hover over me, like a big a cloud; i was in shok at firts. The color of the UFO was grey-dark-plane: no lights, no windows. Only something like pipes on the bottong of the object. This UFO was circular, perfect circular, but in the botton i saw pipes. I am sorry because my english is not to good to describe what i saw that day. But, any way, after 2 minutes the UFO hovering over me, i got out of my car to take a beter look, and in that moment the UFO take off and just desapear on the sky. Days after this event i start to realice that my poetry was much better, so i finish my book of poetry. And not only that one, but more books of poetry. Now, this is my story. Today, i live in Miami, Florida. Now i will like to report this event that happen to my brother. This picture was take in a warehouse store. In the picture is my brother, and in the back, there is something like grey-figure, next to my brother... We will like to you to analize this pictures, and if you see what we see, please let us know. Thanks
